chapter.title: Various Fruits
chapter.para: The next chapters introduce different kinds of fruits, like strawberries or apples.

chapter.title: Strawberries
chapter.para: stre[a]w berige; stre[a]w straw + berie berry; perhaps from the resemblance of the runners of the plant to straws.
A fragrant edible berry, of a delicious taste and commonly of a red colour.
The common American strawberry is Fragaria virginiana, the European is Fragaria vesca.
